text:
bug related to 8325.
made sure i applied all in 8325 but still get...
>Child 2292: Starting 250 worker threads.
>An operation was attempted on something that is not a socket.  : winnt_accept: 
>AcceptEx failed. Attempting to recover.
i also uninstalled qos/filter/mcafee firwall v4 and still get the above fatal 
error starting apache.
creator: jdjoslyn@hotmail.com

text:
i just reinstalled xp and apache. apache fired up just fine.
installed mcafee virus scan v7 (no firewall) and apache then failed.
it is not a mcafee firewall problem, it is mcafee antivirus software.
contacting mcafee with the problem.  will update soon.
creator: jdjoslyn@hotmail.com

text:
had a live chat with McAfee technician who informed me that VirusScan v7 is not 
compatible with server software.  Since the phrase "web server" has the 
word "server" in it, v7 will not work with it.

I did find out that disabling mcafee v7 does not help.
I did find out that stopping the McShields service does help.
After the service stops, apache webserver does start and function.
I do have an open ticket with McAfee on this problem.
creator: jdjoslyn@hotmail.com

text:
Then there is really nothing we can do to resolve this bug.
  Thank you for your very detailed diagnostics and reports!
creator: wrowe@apache.org

text:
Reclassifing as duplicate of 8325
